question: marla starts running around a circular track at the same time nick starts walking around the same circular track . marla completes 28 laps around the track per hour and nick completes 13 laps around the track per hour . how many minutes after marla and nick begin moving will marla have completed 4 more laps around the track than nick ?
3 men and 8 women complete a task in same time as 6 men and 2 women do . how much fraction of work will be finished in same time if 4 men and 5 women will do that task .
if p ( a ) = 4 / 7 and p ( b ) = 2 / 5 , find p ( a n b ) if a and b are independent events .
the second angle of a triangle is double the first ( 110 ) . the third angle is 40 less than the first ( 15 ) . find the first angle .

suresh started a business , investing rs . 18000 . after 3 months and 4 months respectively , rohan and sudhir joined him with capitals of 12000 and 9000 . at the end of the year the total profit was rs . 3872 . what is the difference between rohan ’ s and sudhir ’ s share in the profit ?
on the number line , if x is halfway between - 6 and 4 , and if y is halfway between - 2 and 6 , what number is halfway between x and y ?
a grocer has a sale of rs . 2500 , rs . 4000 , rs . 3540 for 3 consecutive months . how much sale must he have in the fourth month so that he gets an average sale of rs . 2890 ?
rahul can do a work in 3 days while rajesh can do the same work in 2 days . both of them finish the work together and get $ 355 . what is the share of rahul ?

sushil got thrice as many marks in english as in science . his total marks in english , science and maths are 162 . if the ratio of his marks in english and maths is 4 : 5 , find his marks in science ?
in a school with 5 classes , each class has 2 students less than the previous class . how many students are there in the largest class if the total number of students at school is 140 ?
a chemist mixes one liter of pure water with x liters of a 50 % salt solution , and the resulting mixture is a 10 % salt solution . what is the value of x ?
find the product of the place value and face value of 3 in 5769354

a farmer with 1,350 acres of land had planted his fields with corn , sugar cane , and tobacco in the ratio of 3 : 2 : 4 , respectively , but he wanted to make more money , so he shifted the ratio to 2 : 2 : 5 , respectively . how many more acres of land were planted with tobacco under the new system ?
find the value for x from below equation : x / 3 = - 6 ?

the total price of a basic computer and printer are $ 2,500 . if the same printer had been purchased with an enhanced computer whose price was $ 500 more than the price of the basic computer , then the price of the printer would have been 1 / 8 of that total . what was the price of the basic computer ?
there are 7 players in a bowling team with an average weight of 94 kg . if two new players join the team , one weighs 110 kg and the second weighs 60 kg , what will be the new average weight ?

in a triangle abc , ab = 6 , bc = 8 and ac = 10 . a perpendicular dropped from b , meets the side ac at d . a circle of radius bd ( with centre b ) is drawn . if the circle cuts ab and bc at p and q respectively , then ap : qc is equal to
the speed at which a man can row a boat in still water is 15 kmph . if he rows downstream , where the speed of current is 3 kmph , what time will he take to cover 60 metres ?
in a group of cows and hens , the number of legs are 18 more than twice the number of heads . the number of cows is
the interest on a certain deposit at 5 % per annum is rs . 101.20 in one year . how much will the additional interest in one year be on the same deposit at 6 % per annum ?
how many 4 - digit even numbers are possible such that if one of the digits is 5 , the next / succeeding digit to it should be 7 ?
a can do a job in 8 days and b can do it in 20 days . a and b working together will finish twice the amount of work in - - - - - - - days ?
24 men working 8 hours a day can finish a work in 10 days . working at the rate of 10 hours a day , the number of men required to finish the same work in 6 days is

the workforce of company x is 60 % female . the company hired 26 additional male workers , and as a result , the percent of female workers dropped to 55 % . how many employees did the company have after hiring the additional male workers ?

the shopkeeper increased the price of a product by 25 % so that customer finds it difficult to purchase the required amount . but somehow the customer managed to purchase only 70 % of the required amount . what is the net difference in the expenditure on that product ?
what is the value of 10 ^ 8 - 6 ^ 4 ?
if y is the smallest positive integer such that 4410 multiplied by y is the square of an integer , then y must be
what is the total surface area in square meters of a rectangular solid whose length is 10 meters , width is 9 meters , and depth is 6 meters ?
a train running at the speed of 90 km / hr crosses a pole in 6 seconds . find the length of the train .
the population of a town is 15000 . it decreases annually at the rate of 20 % p . a . what will be its population after 2 years ?

the amount of an investment will double in approximately 70 / p years , where p is the percent interest , compounded annually . if thelma invests $ 40,000 in a long - term cd that pays 5 percent interest , compounded annually , what will be the approximate total value of the investment when thelma is ready to retire 42 years later ?

there are 18 balls in a jar . you take out 3 blue balls without putting them back inside , and now the probability of pulling out a blue ball is 1 / 5 . how many blue balls were there in the beginning ?
a cistern 4 meters long and 4 meters wide contains water up to a depth of 1 meter 25 cm . what is the total area of the wet surface ?
an outlet pipe can empty 2 / 3 of a cistern in 20 minutes . in 8 minutes , what part of the cistern will be emptied ?
a large box contains 16 small boxes and each small box contains 25 chocolate bars . how many chocolate bars are in the large box ?

bill made a profit of 10 % by selling a product . if he had purchased that product for 10 % less and sold it at a profit of 30 % , he would have received $ 49 more . what was his original selling price ?
if w is the product of the integers from 1 to 30 , inclusive , what is the greatest integer k for which 3 ^ k is a factor of w ?

water is poured into a tank so that the tank is being filled at the rate of 5 cubic feet per hour . if the empty rectangular tank is 10 feet long , 6 feet wide , and 5 feet deep , approximately how many hours does it take to fill the tank ?
the profit earned by selling an article for rs . 832 is equal to the loss incurred when the same article is sold for rs . 448 . what should be the sale price for making 80 % profit ?

in a market , a dozen eggs cost as much as a pound of rice , and a half - liter of kerosene costs as much as 4 eggs . if the cost of each pound of rice is $ 0.33 , then how many cents does a liter of kerosene cost ? [ one dollar has 100 cents . ]
sandy had $ 140 left after spending 30 % of the money she took for shopping . how much money did sandy take along with her ?

a certain galaxy is known to comprise approximately 2 x 10 ^ 11 stars . of every 50 million of these stars , one is larger in mass than our sun . approximately how many stars in this galaxy are larger than the sun ?

taequan is playing a dice game where he rolls two , fair , 6 - sided dice twice . if he gets the same roll on his second try as his first , he wins . if he rolled an 8 on his first try , what is the probability that he will win with his second roll ?
if six machines working at the same rate can do 3 / 4 of a job in 30 minutes , how many minutes would it take two machines working at the same rate to do 3 / 5 of the job ?
p and q invested in a business . they earned some profit which they divided in the ratio of 2 : 3 . if p invested rs . 60 , 000 , the amount invested by q is :
if x is 20 percent more than y and y is 50 percent less than z , then x is what percent of z ?
if x and y are integers , what is the least positive number of 24 x + 18 y ?
a taxi leaves point a 4 hours after a bus left the same spot . the bus is traveling 30 mph slower than the taxi . find the speed of the taxi , if it overtakes the bus in two hours .
if the length of the side of a square is doubled , what is the ratio of the areas of the original square to the area of the new square ?
